participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Creative and outgoing, enjoys expressing themselves through roleplaying and gaming.
participant_1.background: On weekends I do live action roleplaying events. I drive a Ford Pinto. I play a lot of Call of Duty. I like donuts. My favorite band is the Insane Clown Posse.

participant_2.name: Sam
participant_2.personality: Hands-on and nurturing, finds joy in nature and prefers practical activities.
participant_2.background: I enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. I just got a job working in a gas station. My father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. I'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. I was adopted at a young age to an older couple.

content.text: hello, how are you today? I am doing well, thanks for asking
I am good. It hurts being adopted
oh, I am sorry. do you have any hobbies? I play the action events
oh, that sounds fun. do you like donuts? I do
oh. I do not like donuts. I am a insane clown. you?
oh. I like the band insane clown. do you play any instruments?
oh. I like insane clown roleplaying. do you live on a weekends?
